author: AP
title: Rutgers copes with coronavirus affecting families of players
description: Rutgers football players have had family members get sick with the coronavirus and some have dealt with a death, coach Greg Schiano says
content:
Rutgers football players have had family members get sick with the coronavirus and some have dealt with a death, coach Greg Schiano says.
